issue.title: [C++][Compute] GroupBy: add unittests for individual components of hash group by
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12723](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12723). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add unit tests directly verifying individual building blocks of hash group by:
- hash calculation
- bit utilities introduced by hash group by
- comparison
- hash table core
- encoding and decoding of column-oriented data to row-oriented format

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12723?focusedCommentId=17476162) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
`[~michalno]` is this still valid?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12723?focusedCommentId=17567299) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
This issue has been inactive for 3 months, so it has been unassigned and marked as unstarted. If you are still working on this, feel free to reassign yourself and resume progress.
